thread.title: Traditions at Chesterfield Team Offers Fall Home Tour
thread.title_full: Traditions at Chesterfield Team Offers Fall Home Tour

author: Amanda McConnon
title: Traditions at Chesterfield Team Offers Fall Home Tour
text:
The team at American Properties invites interested homeowners to join them for a fall home tour on September 12th and 13th at Traditions at Chesterfield, their newest community, located within Old York Village. Attendees will tour the completed homes in the Carriage Collection, which features spacious duplex and triplex townhomes. “With an award-winning neo-traditional design, homes in the Carriage Collection offer maximum space and comfort,” said Barry Edelman, Managing Partner for Traditions at Chesterfield. “Duplex and triplex options exist to meet every homeowner’s needs.” The townhomes offer up to 2,714 square feet of living space including three or four bedrooms and up to 2.5 baths. Each boasts well-appointed features including stainless steel appliances, quality crafted cabinetry and designer flooring.
Main-level dining, living and family rooms flow into each other to provide elegant spaces for spending time with family and entertaining guests while walk-in/walk-out basements, one- and two-car garages and optional recreation rooms create added room that can be used to suit any lifestyle.
“At the fall home tour, prospective homeowners will learn about our quick-delivery models, which provide an ideal option for homeowners looking for a speedy and hassle-free move,” said Edelman. “We’ll also explain how our available incentives allow homeowners to choose desirable upgrades for standard prices.”
Located in Chesterfield, NJ, voted #1 “Best Place to Live” in Burlington County by Philadelphia Magazine, the homeowners at Traditions at Chesterfield enjoy an idyllic location with guaranteed preservation of green space for years to come. Homeowners can spend time outdoors at nearby Margerum Wildlife Park, Fenton Lane Park and Old York Country Club. Upon completion, the Shoppes at Old York Village will provide residents with dining and shopping just outside their front doors. Convenient access to the NJ Turnpike, Routes 130, 206, I-96 and Route 1 corridor makes commuting easy while school-aged children enjoy the benefits of attending the highly regarded Chesterfield Public School District.
“We invite anyone interested in owning a luxury townhome with a premium location to join us for our fall home tour,” added Edelman. Refreshments will be served at the event.
Prices for townhomes at Traditions at Chesterfield begin at $299,990 and Single-Family Homes begin at $399,990. Interested homebuyers can visit the Traditions at Chesterfield Carriage Collection Sales Office, located at 26 Mountie Lane (GPS: 246 Recklesstown Way), Chesterfield, NJ or the Traditions at Chesterfield Single Family Classics Sales Office, located at 82 Bordentown Crosswicks Road, Chesterfield, NJ. Sales Offices are open seven days a week from 10am to 5pm. Schedule an appointment with an on-site sales consultant by calling 609.424.0028 for the Carriage Collection or 609.424.0026 for Single Family Classics. For more information, visit traditionsatchesterfield.com
